abstract: At Lockheed Missiles & Space Company, the IRIDIUM commercial space program is dramatically revolutionizing spacecraft development and manufacturing processes to reduce cost while maintaining quality and reliability. This report includes the following sections: an overview of the IRIDIUM system, the Lockheed IRIDIUM project and challenges; cycle-time reduction through production reorganization; and design for manufacturing and quality.
title: IRIDIUM (R): A Lockheed transition to commercial space

publications.publicationName: Proceedings of the Fourth International Mobile Satellite Conference (IMSC 1995)
